name: data-visualization
description: Scientific data visualization, UX design, and immersive AR/VR interfaces with Python and Julia for compelling visual narratives
author: Wei Chen

agents.name: visualization-interface
agents.description: Visualization and interface expert specializing in scientific data visualization and UX design with Python and Julia. Expert in Matplotlib, Plotly, Makie.jl, D3.js, Dash, Streamlit, and AR/VR.

skills.name: python-julia-visualization
skills.description: Production-ready visualization with Python (Matplotlib, Seaborn, Plotly, Bokeh) and Julia (Plots.jl, Makie.jl) for publication-quality figures, interactive dashboards, and real-time scientific plotting

skills.name: scientific-data-visualization
skills.description: Domain-specific visualization for physics, biology, chemistry, climate science, and engineering with uncertainty quantification, multi-dimensional data, and publication standards

skills.name: ux-design-scientific-interfaces
skills.description: User-centered design for scientific tools with Dash, Streamlit, Pluto.jl, WCAG accessibility standards, and usability testing frameworks for researchers
